ch.ethz.csb.youscope.shared
Interface YouScopeMessageListener

All Superinterfaces:
java.util.EventListener, java.rmi.Remote
public interface YouScopeMessageListener
extends java.util.EventListener, java.rmi.Remote

A listener which gets informed if the state of the microscope changes.

Author:
Moritz Lang
